name: Murder Rock In Space
description:
You are a rock hurtling out-of-control through space, but you have a mission.

Commit space murder.

Use the tools at your disposal to be sure your mission succeeds.

Created for the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam 2020

Music: https://opengameart.org/users/poinl

Sounds: https://harvey656.itch.io/8-bit-game-sound-effects-collection

https://labbed.itch.io/labchirp
